intro: Please review the following guidelines to ensure accurate and professional skill entries before proceeding.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: The Skill Matrix helps management maintain a current, searchable record of skills across teams.
points: Track organizational expertise to identify strengths and gaps.
Enable better project allocation and resource planning.
Create a transparent, standardized skill repository.

benefits.title: Benefits
list: Faster staffing and fewer context switches.

howToUse.title: How to use
steps: Fill skills honestly and professionally with concise descriptions.
Select the right category, sub-category, and tools for each entry.
Choose the correct expertise level (L1, L2, L3).
Review entries and fix typos, duplicates, or misplaced tools before submitting.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
warnings: This tool is not for promotions or appraisals.
Do not enter personal or non-professional data.

disclaimer.footer: Data handling: Entries are visible to relevant leadership and staffing teams and may be used for internal reporting.

levelHint.label: What are L1/L2/L3?
levelHint.tooltip: L1: Basic familiarity | L2: Hands-on proficiency | L3: Expert who can mentor
